description: Houtou is first introduced in episode 10 of Shin Koihime Musou as another of Shibaki`s students. When Shuri returns to visit Shibaki, Houtou becomes jealous of the relationship between the two as she felt Shuri was taking her mother figure away from her. But after a talk to sort out the misunderstanding between her and Shuri, Houtou revealed she never hated Shuri since she wanted to know more about her. Since then, both of them have become friends.
name: Houtou Shigen
